Articles.Content: hi i would like to make my own flags for kip and i have seen you guys do it i was just wondering how??? thanks.

You just have to create an image on paint or gimp or something like that that is 256x160 pixels and then save it as a PNG file. Then you put it into GameData/insertrandomfolder/Flags make your own folder, don't put it into the squad one, and lastly make sure the F in flags is capitalised.
I've had luck with putting them into GameData/Squad/Flags; not sure it actually matters.
It doesn't matter really, it's just that I feel that squad should be for stock parts, and so I can have better organisation, to easily find what I need.
